text: Can you help me check if I have a reminder to call my mom on March 16th at 2:30pm?
Sure, I can definitely help with that. Just to confirm, you want me to set a reminder for you to call your mom on March 16th at 2:30pm, correct?
Great. To check a reminder, I'll need your username and a valid token. Could you please provide me with your username and password?
My username is JohnDoe and my password is pass123.
Thank you. I was able to generate a token for you.
Alright, I find that you already have a reminder set for "Call mom" on March 16, 2023 at 2:30 PM.
